title: THE.PARTY.1968.PAL.DVDR.EN.MULTISUBS[11] -Lindoff
description:
Description
Hollywood mogul Fred Clutterbuck isn't just giving a party, he's giving 'The Party'. Absolutely everyone who's anyone will be there: gorgeous models, ravishing starlets, powerful producers - even a baby elephant! And by mistaken invitation, accident-prone Indian actor Hrundi V. Bakshi (Peter Sellers) will be there, too. He wouldn't miss it for the world and if you enjoy side-splitting gags neither should you!

Special Features
'Inside The Party': a documentary featuring interviews with the film's producer and members of the crew 
Vintage interviews with Peter Sellers 
'The Party Revolution - A New Technology': a featurette on the 'video-assist' system 
Commercials from Barclays Bank 
Photo gallery 
Theatrical trailer 
Interactive menu 
Scene access

Technical Details
Actors Peter Sellers, Claudine Longet, Natalia Borisova, Jean Carson & Marge Champion
Director Blake Edwards
Certificate PG
Year 1968
Screen Widescreen 2.35:1 Anamorphic
Languages English - Dolby Digital (5.1)
Subtitles French  Dutch  Polish  Greek  Turkish  Swedish  Finnish  Norwegian  Danish  Portuguese  English for the hearing impaired
Duration 1 hour and 36 minutes (approx)
Region Region 2
